songs.title: Like a Virgin - Live 2006
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
All right, London
Are you ready to ride with me?
I said: are you ready?
Are you ready?

[Verse 1]
I made it through the wilderness
Somehow I made it through
Didn't know how lost I was until I found you
I was beat, incomplete, I'd been had
I was sad and blue, but you made me feel
Yeah, you made me feel shiny and new

[Chorus 1]
Like a virgin
Touched for the very first time
Like a virgin
When your heart beats next to mine

[Verse 2]
Gonna give you all my love, boy
My fear is fading fast
Been saving it all for you, 'cause only love can last
You're so fine and you're mine
Make me strong, yeah, you make me bold
Oh, your love thawed out
Yeah, your love thawed out what was scared and cold

[Chorus 2]
Like a virgin
Touched for the very first time
Like a virgin
When your heart beats next to mine
Whoa
Whoa

[Interlude]

[Chorus]
Like a virgin
Touched for the very first time
Like a virgin
When your heart beats next to mine
Whoa
Whoa

[Outro]
Feels so good inside
When you kiss me, and you touch and you hold me
Feels so good inside
